name: Rocket Find
description:
Welcome to Rocket Find!

You borrowed a toy rocketship from your best friend--but someone took it. (Oh no!) And she's coming over for lunch at noon. (Double oh no!)

Some friendly monsters will assist, but you have to bribe them with their favorite food.  Give them their favorite food and they'll eliminate a suspect.  Eliminate enough suspects before noon and you've found your thief!

* * *
The Basics:

  •  Land on a monster and you'll get a chance to bribe it with food.  If you guess right, they'll eliminate a suspect for you.  (You can only bribe a monster once and each monster has a unique favorite food.)  If you don't guess right, you'll be told its favorite food.
  •  Land on the clock and the time will advance by an hour.  The time also advances by an hour at random times.  When the clock hits noon, game over.
  •  Land on the magnifying glasses, and you'll get a hint.
  •  Land on the arrows, and you'll be able to jump to any square.  Choose wisely.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

This game is built using the Love2d framework and was inspired by Wer's Wars.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0 
Certain graphic elements from freepik.com:   Designers -- [Monsters] macrovector / Freepik; [Suspects] Freepik; [Food] Katemangostar / Freepik.
